verses.verse: בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> In that day הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יִֽהְיֶה֙ <S%H1961><s%> become מָק֣וֹר <S%H4726><s%> there shall be a fountain נִפְתָּ֔ח <S%H6605><s%> opened לְבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> to the house דָּוִ֖יד <S%H1732><s%> of David וּלְיֹשְׁבֵ֣י <S%H3427><s%> and to the inhabitants יְרֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem לְחַטַּ֖את <S%H2403><s%> for sin וּלְנִדָּֽה׃ <S%H5079><s%> and for uncleanness

וְהָיָה֩ <S%H1961><s%> will come בַיּ֨וֹם <S%H3117><s%> And it shall come to pass in that day הַה֜וּא <S%H1931><s%> he נְאֻ֣ם ׀ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֗וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts אַכְרִ֞ית <S%H3772><s%> [that] I will cut off אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁמ֤וֹת <S%H8034><s%> the names הָֽעֲצַבִּים֙ <S%H6091><s%> of the idols מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> will no יִזָּכְר֖וּ <S%H2142><s%> and they shall no more be remembered ע֑וֹד <S%H5750><s%> longer וְגַ֧ם <S%H1571><s%> will also אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנְּבִיאִ֛ים <S%H5030><s%> and also I will cause the prophets וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ר֥וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> spirit הַטֻּמְאָ֖ה <S%H2932><s%> and the unclean אַעֲבִ֥יר <S%H5674><s%> to pass מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> out of the land

וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> become כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> and if יִנָּבֵ֣א <S%H5012><s%> shall yet prophesy אִישׁ֮ <S%H376><s%> And it shall come to pass [that] when any עוֹד֒ <S%H5750><s%> still וְאָמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> him shall say אֵ֠לָיו <S%H413><s%> then אָבִ֨יו <S%H1><s%> then his father וְאִמּ֤וֹ <S%H517><s%> and his mother יֹֽלְדָיו֙ <S%H3205><s%> that begat לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִֽחְיֶ֔ה <S%H2421><s%> unto him Thou shalt not live כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> and if שֶׁ֥קֶר <S%H8267><s%> lies דִּבַּ֖רְתָּ <S%H1696><s%> for thou speakest בְּשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> in the name יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וּדְקָרֻ֜הוּ <S%H1856><s%> him shall thrust אָבִ֧יהוּ <S%H1><s%> and his father וְאִמּ֛וֹ <S%H517><s%> and his mother יֹלְדָ֖יו <S%H3205><s%> that begat בְּהִנָּבְאֽוֹ׃ <S%H5012><s%> him through when he prophesieth

וְהָיָ֣ה ׀ <S%H1961><s%> will come בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> And it shall come to pass in that day הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יֵבֹ֧שׁוּ <S%H954><s%> shall be ashamed הַנְּבִיאִ֛ים <S%H5030><s%> [that] the prophets אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one מֵחֶזְיֹנ֖וֹ <S%H2384><s%> of his vision בְּהִנָּֽבְאֹת֑וֹ <S%H5012><s%> when he hath prophesied וְלֹ֧א <S%H3808><s%> and they will not יִלְבְּשׁ֛וּ <S%H3847><s%> neither shall they wear אַדֶּ֥רֶת <S%H155><s%> garment שֵׂעָ֖ר <S%H8181><s%> a rough לְמַ֥עַן <S%H4616><s%> order כַּחֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H3584><s%> to deceive

וְאָמַ֕ר <S%H559><s%> But he shall say לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> I am not נָבִ֖יא <S%H5030><s%> I [am] no prophet אָנֹ֑כִי <S%H595><s%> I אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> he עֹבֵ֤ד <S%H5647><s%> serve אֲדָמָה֙ <S%H127><s%> of the ground אָנֹ֔כִי <S%H595><s%> I כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for אָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> for man הִקְנַ֥נִי <S%H7069><s%> taught me to keep cattle מִנְּעוּרָֽי׃ <S%H5271><s%> from my youth

וְאָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> And [one] shall say אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> to him מָ֧ה <S%H4100><s%> What הַמַּכּ֛וֹת <S%H4347><s%> unto him What [are] these wounds הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> are these בֵּ֣ין <S%H996><s%> between יָדֶ֑יךָ <S%H3027><s%> and one וְאָמַ֕ר <S%H559><s%> will say אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which הֻכֵּ֖יתִי <S%H5221><s%> [Those] with which I was wounded בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> [in] the house מְאַהֲבָֽי׃ <S%H157><s%> of my friends ס

חֶ֗רֶב <S%H2719><s%> O sword עוּרִ֤י <S%H5782><s%> Awake עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against רֹעִי֙ <S%H7473><s%> shipherd וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and against גֶּ֣בֶר <S%H1397><s%> and against the man עֲמִיתִ֔י <S%H5997><s%> [that is] my fellow נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3069><s%> God צְבָא֑וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts הַ֤ךְ <S%H5221><s%> smite אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָֽרֹעֶה֙ <S%H7462><s%> against my shepherd וּתְפוּצֶ֣יןָ <S%H6327><s%> shall be scattered הַצֹּ֔אן <S%H6629><s%> and the sheep וַהֲשִׁבֹתִ֥י <S%H7725><s%> and I will turn יָדִ֖י <S%H3027><s%> mine hand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against הַצֹּעֲרִֽים׃ <S%H6819><s%> upon the little ones

וְהָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> will come בְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> And it shall come to pass [that] in all the land נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD פִּֽי־ <S%H6310><s%> parts שְׁנַ֣יִם <S%H8147><s%> two בָּ֔הּ יִכָּרְת֖וּ <S%H3772><s%> therein shall be cut off יִגְוָ֑עוּ <S%H1478><s%> [and] die וְהַשְּׁלִשִׁ֖ית <S%H7992><s%> but the third יִוָּ֥תֶר <S%H3498><s%> shall be left בָּֽהּ׃

וְהֵבֵאתִ֤י <S%H935><s%> And I will bring אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשְּׁלִשִׁית֙ <S%H7992><s%> the third part בָּאֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> through the fire וּצְרַפְתִּים֙ <S%H6884><s%> and will refine כִּצְרֹ֣ף <S%H6884><s%> is refined אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכֶּ֔סֶף <S%H3701><s%> them as silver וּבְחַנְתִּ֖ים <S%H974><s%> and will try כִּבְחֹ֣ן <S%H974><s%> is tried אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַזָּהָ֑ב <S%H2091><s%> them as gold ה֣וּא ׀ <S%H1931><s%> They יִקְרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> they shall call בִשְׁמִ֗י <S%H8034><s%> on my name וַֽאֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> and I אֶעֱנֶ֣ה <S%H6030><s%> and I will hear אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> אָמַ֙רְתִּי֙ <S%H559><s%> them I will say עַמִּ֣י <S%H5971><s%> It [is] my people ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וְה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> I יֹאמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> and they shall say יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD אֱלֹהָֽי׃ <S%H430><s%> [is] my God ס
